pr_title: Add a cloud instance automatically when running in hpi:run mode

timeline.message: Add a cloud instance automatically when running in hpi:run mode

replies.bodyText: Just noticed that the field was set to 0 when using this constructor instead of the default value.
replies.author: Vlatombe

timeline.bodyText: This does not trigger in JenkinsRule, right?
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText: You made me doubt, but it works as advertised (When using JenkinsRule, Main.isUnitTest == true but Main.isDevelopmentMode == false)
replies.author: Vlatombe
